summary: The video shows examples of cute desktop applications, including an egg timer and a tic-tac-toe game. The creator indicates that this is a tutorial on how to make your first desktop application and that it is beginner-friendly. A YouTube video with a step-by-step tutorial is mentioned, along with a GitHub repository for template code. The creator waves goodbye at the end.
caption: This video provides a tutorial on creating beginner-friendly desktop applications with a cute aesthetic. It showcases examples of applications like an egg timer and tic-tac-toe, and directs viewers to a YouTube tutorial and GitHub for code. The creator bids farewell at the end.
transcript:
Easy cute little desktop app tutorial

Super beginner friendly.

From how to set up

happy coding!
Bye <3
